fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, initiate a challenge. Submit a role name, it preferably should be a role name that doesn't exist.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- That night, all other players must submit a role in <#970046125065265202> with that exact role name. Anyone who doesn't do this dies. You can submit one, but you don't have to and it's optional.
- The next day, you rate all submissions on a scale of 0-10. The lowest scored player dies (if tied, rng), the highest scored player becomes that role. If the role would be rule 17'd, they instead gain a permanent defense increase.
- If you die with a pending challenge, the challenge doesn't end.
